behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote_control(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        # Ensure the remote control is in hand

        achieve facing_char(char, television)
        # Face the television

        achieve is_on(television)
        # Turn on the television using the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control] == 2052
        # Bind the remote control with ID 2052

        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television) and id[television] == 248
        # Bind the television with ID 248

        turn_on_tv_with_remote_control(remote_control, television)

def has_switch_on_remote_control(remote_control:item):
    # Function to determine whether the remote control has a switch
    symbol has_switch=exists switch: item : has_switch(switch) and on(remote_control, switch)
    return has_switch

behavior use_remote_control(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        # Temporarily hold the remote control
        
        if has_switch_on_remote_control(remote_control):
            # If the remote control has a switch, use it to turn on the TV
            achieve is_on(television)
        
        achieve_once inhand(None)
        # Release the remote control after use
